use_cases_desc: General interaction with large display when using mobile devices (e.g., for control, transfer content)
contribution_desc: Study about the effectiveness of labels used to make suers aware of particular interaction techniques when using small mobile devices to interact with large displays. Very short paper, just one page. Findings: best placement below the large screen; possibly showing interaction sequence, like a storyboard; also found that pictures can complement but not completely override the need for text.
interaction_techniques: For interacting with large display: drawing, pointing, touching, pointing
